Posts.Title: To All of You lukejessesmom juntom

Posts.Content: Nov 30, 2010 07:32PM - edited Aug 20, 2013 05:18AM by juntom Hi im from Manchester England ,i wan,t to thank all you women on the boards at breastcancer.org you have been my inspiration this last 12 months , i think i would have been in lala land if it was.nt for you ,you are wonderful i  know that there must be loads of women out there that just read the boards and are scared to speak,  with you ladies  we are never alone so thank you ive just had my 12 months mamargram its clear never thought i would get here  x x x x
Posts.Title: To All of You lukejessesmom juntom
